author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Bathroom tile floor tips…I trowel mortar in one direction. And maximize the notch by holding the trowel at a 45 degree angle. I also use 1/16 inch horseshoe shims to maintain even grout joints. If you’re remodeling a bathroom check out our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥#tile #tilefloors #bathroomrenovation #homerenovations
title: Bathroom Tile Floor Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
